description: Visual check - visual assessment is needed, wound and location entered as text
Suture check - suture check is needed, wound and location entered as text
Pain Score, Separate post-op monitoring sheet needs to be completed
Indicate that an email was sent or received, may be to anyone, or any group
Text box to indicate that one, or more, of the lab tests above were ordered, but not received
Rectal Culture needed for outdoor to indoor housing transition
Day or date to check for lab results
Awaiting medical assessment for euthanasia, plus date for assessment
Pending relocation, date of relocation sometimes entered
Text field needed for entry of additional instructions
